modName: Gta San Andreas ENB For Skyrim - Without lose FPS
summary: This is a very simple version of ENB Series, it\'s simply GTA San Andreas ENB for Skyrim, it\'s perfect who don\'t have a powerful Video-card (like mine).
descriptionHtml:
-< G T A    S A N    A N D R E A S    E N B    F O R    S K Y R I M >-

[ IMPORTANT INFO: ]

- I dont made this mod, i only edited Boris Vorontsov\'s ENB Series for Gta San Andreas to make compatible with Skyrim, you can edit enbseries.ini to add Bloom or other effects, i \"create\" this mod only for who want to have a better graphics, to increase the contrast, for a better Motion Blur, and to add other effects to Skyrim, even if you have a medium PC, so without spend FPS, i hope you will like it, i realy like it because i dont like the color of Skyrim\'s textures...
I hope you\'ll like it :)

- If you already have an ENB version on your Skyrim this mod will replace it so you should make a Back-Up.

- Main menu will be a little blurred, i applied this effect for wrong, but i like it, if you want to have a clearer main menu you can edit \"enbseries.ini\" and set \"EnableMotionBlur=0\", but remember, you will not have Motion Blur in-game.

[ INSTALL: ]

To install this Mod is very very simple, you have only to extract \"Gta San Andreas ENB for Skyrim.zip\"  to your Skyrim directory (where there is the .exe file).

Thanks for reading :D
author: Boris Vorontsov

files.name: Gta San Andreas ENB for Skyrim
